resources:
CodeMaze> Issues: %s / %s Optimizers: %s Optimizers: %s/%s Score: %s Time: %s %s %s
SettingzActivity
Game Misc.
Your signature Default reply action Allow Vibrations Allow this game to vibrate the phone.\n*WIP Setting; toggling currently does nothing.* This game will never vibrate your phone.
Sync email periodically Download incoming attachments Automatically download attachments for incoming emails Only download attachments when manually requested
Rainbow Character Character constantly changes colors, cycling though the entire rainbow. *may interfere with character color blinking during things like collisions with tiles and game over animations. When off, Character stays normal white color. \nWhen on, Character constantly changes colors, cycling though the entire rainbow.\n*WIP setting, currently will not work*
Keep generating optimizers after goal has been met When on, after the optimizers goal has been met, optimizer tiles will still keep appearing forever.\n*WIP setting, toggling off currently will not affect anything* When off, no more optimizers will appear after the goal has been met and the Finish tile has appeared.
